author: Staff Reporter
text:
As many as 15 passengers were injured after the Karnataka State Road Transport Corporation (KSRTC) bus hit the road side median and fell off a bridge near Valayapatti here in the early hours on Saturday.

The bus with 50 passengers was proceeding from Bengaluru to Kumbakonam on the Madurai – Bengaluru National Highway. At 4 a.m. while nearing Valayapatti, the bus driver attempted to overtake a lorry on a bridge. But the bus hit the median and fell off the bridge from 10 feet to the road. In the impact, the front portion of the bus was completely damaged. The driver and 14 passengers were injured and they were rescued and admitted to private hospitals and District Government Headquarters Hospital. Mohanur police registered a case and are investigating.
title: 15 injured as bus falls off bridge
